reset 0
reset 1
interval 50

# Wake up CLF
// NCI CORE RESET CMD
send 20000100

// NCI CORE INIT CMD
send 2001020000

# RF ON
// NCI SYSTEM ENABLE PROPRIETARY CMD
send 2F0200

// NCI Disable standby mode
send 2F000100

// DISABLE DPC
send 2F3F03700201

// START CONTINUOUS RF ON
send 2F3F03320200

sleep 2

# RF OFF
// STOP CONTINUOUS RF ON
send 2F3F03320000

// NCI Enable standby mode
send 2F000101
